TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: You 360 is a 360 video streaming platform
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_TITLE: How to use the You360 app
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Create an account and sign in then start watching or uploading 360 videos
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: After Signing in successfully the app redirect you to videos page you can click on any video to open video details page , or you can click the upper plus button to open video upload page then fill the form and click on the check button on the upper corner , in the video details page you can play video and like it or comment , dislike , report, and find similar videos
WELCOME_INTRO: Welcome, Please Login or create new Account
LOGIN_ERROR: Unable to sign in. Please check your account information and try again.
SIGNUP_ERROR: Unable to create account. Please check your account information and try again.
SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search the videos list, e.g. "Donald Duck"
